summary: My Real Life Mage Girlfriend as a follower.
descriptionHtml:
I decided to upload my Real Life Girlfriend(yes they do exist) as a follower so you can all experience a pretty kick ass Mage. You can find her at the Winking Skeever. For her spells, you will just have to find out. Though I warn you. She will cause friendly fire in combat.


Simple yet Fun.

Since I am still horrible at putting images on this site it seems.. If you want to see her go to this Imgur link.

http://imgur.com/h7mht9N,JLf8NRE,HUQXtWL,Cs3cvgF,tCSdEa4#0

Also the first image on here I just noticed was me forcepushing my other real life friend and I uploaded it to this image group by mistake. 2nd through 5th are images of her and a dance party.
author: AlphaQ23
